channel.title: Export a drum rack to Ableton?
channel.description:
Thanks for adding ableton export, it’s great!
Is it possible to export the drum/samples as racks themselves into Ableton (Each sample having independent parameters such as volumes, etc)?

item.title: Export a drum rack to Ableton?
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Ableton doesn’t support this but we’re hoping that they’ll add it in the future so that we can implement the feature.

Read full topic
item.source: Export a drum rack to Ableton?
